metadata.title: CVE-2018-14473 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: OCS Inventory 2.4.1 lacks a proper XML parsing configuration, allowing theuse of external entities. This issue can be exploited by an attackersending a crafted HTTP request in order to exfiltrate information or causea Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: ocsinventory-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
